title: Uyanış: Büyük Selçuklu
overview: Uyanış: Büyük Selçuklu is a Turkish historical drama series that follows the life of both Sultan Melikşah and his son Sencer in the 11th century Seljuk Empire. The series portrays the political and military struggles of the empire against various enemies, including the Byzantine Empire, the Crusaders, and internal rebellions. Uyanış: Büyük Selçuklu has gained a significant following both in Turkey and internationally and is known for its attention to historical detail and engaging storytelling.
